mapper.insert: insert into `user-club` (user_id, club_id, authority, role, state) values (#{userId},#{clubId},#{authority},#{role},#{state})
mapper.select: select u.id,u.username, c.id clubId, c.name clubName, authority,uc.role from user u left join `user-club` uc on u.id = uc.user_id left join club c on uc.club_id = c.id where user_id = #{userId} and state = 2

select u.id,u.username, c.id clubId, c.name clubName, authority,uc.role from user u left join `user-club` uc on u.id = uc.user_id left join club c on uc.club_id = c.id where club_id = #{clubId} and state = 2
